ygData.subject: Re: O'Keill's Radiation
ygData.msgSnippet: O Keills Radation is a damage shield. You cast the spell on yourself or another person, and everytiem the monster does melee damage to them, it reflects back
ygData.messageBody:
O'Keills Radation is a damage shield. You cast the spell on yourself or another person, and everytiem the monster does melee damage to them, it reflects back some damage. This spell only does 2 damage and I find it to be useless, the Magi damage shields are MUCH MUCH better. At lvl 4 it was reflecting 5 damage, compared to mine that only did 2, and I am pretty sure that the higher-lvl ones dish out more. I am not sure if we get any more damage shields tho.
-----Original Message-----
From: Teri <greenidminx@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, April 18, 1999 12:00 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] O'Keill's Radiation


I'm a little confused as t o the effect of O'Keill's Radiation. Would
someone be so kind as to enlighten me to its' proper purpose and
usage?

I'm a level 6 wiz on Fennin Ro. Please say hello if you see me about.

=)

Ximena
